table_headers.Status: Completion status indicator - shows in the row has been edited
table_headers.Confidence: How confident are you that your interval, from min to max, could capture the true value of yield loss in this scenario?
table_headers.YIELD LOSS: What percent of the total yield would you expect to lose in the scenario when no spray is applied, and if the optimum spray program is followed?
table_headers.Actions: Add a comment, duplicate and modify a scenario, or delete a scenario
table_headers.Canopy Density: How dense is the lupin canopy?  dense -> cannot see the soil /n moderate -> soil visible in patches /n sparse -> soil clearly visible between plants
table_headers.4-WEEK RAINFALL HISTORY (DAYS): Number of days with rainfall in the 4 weeks (28 days) prior to the spray decision date
table_headers.RAINFALL OUTLOOK (2-WEEKS): Number of days with rainfall in the 2 weeks (14 days) following the spray application
table_headers.LANDSCAPE POSITION: Where is the scenario located in the landscape? (e.g., valley, slope, ridge)
table_headers.SOIL TYPE: What type of soil is present at the site? (e.g., sandy, clayey )

distribution_parameters.Min: Realistically, what do you think the lowest plausible value for yield loss in this scenario is?
distribution_parameters.Mode: Most likely value, what is your best guess for yield loss in this scenario?
distribution_parameters.Max: Realistically, what do you think the highest plausible value for yield loss in this scenario is?
